section.p: Here at your castle you can leave possessions and money to keep them safe. Write the items you are leaving in the box provided (remembering to erase them from your Adventure Sheet).
You can also recuperate here if injured: restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score.

.
If you score a double one, immediately. If not, read on.
Your steward comes in to welcome you home. 'What do you require?' he asks.

choices.choice: Gather your knights for weapons practice
